name: ISOTOPE - LD49
description:
This is the first game I make alone for a Ludum Dare. In ISOTOPE you are a small (and unstable) Uranium block that must find its way to the Reactor before your half-life expires and you die. On the way there, you will interact with other radioactive elements that will affect you in different ways while you navigate the small levels and manage your half-life resource.

This game was made for Ludum Dare 49, hope you have fun.
